com.twitter.sdk.android.core.services

Interface AccountService


  • public interface AccountService

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User verifyCredentials(Boolean includeEntities, Boolean skipStatus)
      Synchronous version of the verify credentials API.
      void verifyCredentials(Boolean includeEntities, Boolean skipStatus, Callback<User> cb)
      Returns an HTTP 200 OK response code and a representation of the requesting user if authentication was successful; returns a 401 status code and an error message if not.

    • Method Detail

      • verifyCredentials

        @GET(value="/1.1/account/verify_credentials.json")
void verifyCredentials(@Query(value="include_entities")
                         Boolean includeEntities,
                         @Query(value="skip_status")
                         Boolean skipStatus,
                         Callback<User> cb)
        Returns an HTTP 200 OK response code and a representation of the requesting user if authentication was successful; returns a 401 status code and an error message if not. Use this method to test if supplied user credentials are valid.
        Parameters:
        includeEntities - (optional) The entities node will not be included when set to false.
        skipStatus - (optional) When set to either true, t or 1 statuses will not be included in the returned user objects.
        cb - The callback to invoke when the request completes.

      • verifyCredentials

        @GET(value="/1.1/account/verify_credentials.json")
User verifyCredentials(@Query(value="include_entities")
                         Boolean includeEntities,
                         @Query(value="skip_status")
                         Boolean skipStatus)
        Synchronous version of the verify credentials API. Returns an HTTP 200 OK response code and a representation of the requesting user if authentication was successful; returns a 401 status code and an error message if not. Use this method to test if supplied user credentials are valid.
        Parameters:
        includeEntities - (optional) The entities node will not be included when set to false.
        skipStatus - (optional) When set to either true, t or 1 statuses will not be included in the returned user objects.
        Returns:
        the User Object
